==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|s=一样米养百样人|type=211111}}

===Etymology===
Literally: The same kind of rice provides for one hundred kinds of people.

===Pronunciation===
{{zh-pron
|m=一yàng mǐ yǎng bǎi yàng rén
|cat=prov
}}

===Proverb===
{{zh-proverb}}

# Everybody thinks a little differently.
